name: A Dana
text: I've had a wonderful counselor here for 2 years. Highly recommend!

name: Autumn May
text: I was recommended to call this place but after calling all week about services they never return phone calls, even with voicemails left! I’ll find some other services.

name: Maitri Ganguly
text: My counselor was Elizabeth and I wanted someone to help me gather all my strength and fight back. She was able to peek deep inside me and could address the points I needed. It's been about 2yrs and I still remember everything she told me and I still practice them.

name: Ellie Banks
text: I have had a great experience with Oasis. My therapist, Leah, is very comforting, kind and attentive. I've always had positive interactions with the office staff and I would definitely recommend.

name: Krissy Cinnamon
text: Completely disgusted by the way I was treated here. They are supposed to be “non profit,” but all they care about is money. My therapist retired without even telling me. I requested off work 2 weeks in advance to see another person. They “randomly” do a file check 30 MINUTES before an appointment in which I desperately needed help. Since I didn’t have the amount of money they wanted (I borrowed enough to get there from a friend), they cancelled my appointment and left me in tears and gave me no other options for who to call. If I had plenty of money to give them, I’m sure they would have found a way to see me. Also, SHAME on Mrs. Player for retiring and not even telling me. Really inconsiderate and money hungry despite the fact that they get proper funding and should see low income people needing help. I didn’t get it here.......

name: Kristina Blackmon
text: What's in a name? Everything. This place is an oasis. The people here are nice. Its a judgement free place and i always leave refreshed.

name: Ambra Richardson
text: Awesome place. I didnt feel out of place or judged. I was able to open up and let things out and left with a smile on my face and feeling much better than I did.

name: Kara
text: My young daughter has benefited immensely from counseling here and she looks forward to going all the time. They work with my low income so we can easily afford to come regularly.

name: R Heffner
text: Near uab

name: Genoc Genesis
text: I see Maggie Kellar and her nurse Mackenzie. They are both fantastic and very personable. I drive 45 minutes just to see them specifically. My experience with Mrs.Kellar is the best doctor/patient experience I have ever had. As long as the both of them are there I will always come back.

resp.text:
We appreciate the five-star review. Thank you for taking the time. I share this with the team!
Kindly,
April

name: melody galloway
text: Wonderful clinical staff.  Love love LOVE Dr. Lona!  She's intuitive and kind always.

resp.text:
Melody, thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. We appreciate your kind words and I will share them with the team.
Kindly,
April

name: Mark Gotschall
text: This place is so much the improvement over the Mobile location.  Miss Anita has always taken good care of me.

resp.text:
We appreciate the review and value your feedback. Thanks for taking the time. I will share it with our team!
Kindly,
April

name: Bernard Doug Cook
text: Seeing a therapist there, Barbara Lee, she's pretty good.

resp.text:
Hi Bernard, thank you so much for the review. I am happy to hear you've had a positive experience at BayView. I will share your feedback with our team!
Kindly,
April

name: Paula D
text: I love this office! I recently had my first appointment there in the office with Ms. kellar. The nurse mckenzie and ms Keller we’re both very kind and i could tell they really cared about me and my mental health. As long as dr kellar and McKenzie are there i will continue to come.

resp.text:
So glad you had a great experience, Paula. I will share your feedback and praise with our team. Have a wonderful day!
April

name: Gail GULF SHORES
text: So far so good for the excellent help I've got online with KATHERINE DAVIS. She is a very compassionate employee,  "goes the extra mile ". So helpful with any questions.  A keeper.

resp.text:
Hi, Gail! Thank you for the five-star review. We appreciate your kind words.
Sincerely,
April

name: Sandi Cushway
text: They completely changed my medications that I have been stable on for over 15 years (with not ever having to increase ANYTHING).  I have only seen the PA twice and she was pretty nice.  There seems to be little concern for what I, as their patient, am going through every single day as a result of their decisions.  They are making matters worse for me mentally to where I am barely functional at home or work.  The only reason I gave two stars is for the nurse, Anita.

resp.text:
Sandi, I am sorry to hear we did not meet your expectations. Your feedback will help us improve our services. If there is anything further you wish to add you can reach a member of our patient relations department at info@altapointe.org.
Kindly,
April

name: Billiam Quine
text: They have an issue with making sure their records are up to date. Their staff isn’t helpful and I’m not sure they could be even if they wanted to. Lots of “Its not my problem” going on there. Find someone else to see. Just because they may be the biggest certainly doesn’t mean they are the best.

resp.text:
Hi, Billiam. I am sorry to hear we did not meet your expectations of care. We appreciate the feedback because it will help us improve our care. If you would like to share more about your experience you can send an email to info@altapointe.org or reach our Patient Relations department at (833) 921-1811.
Kindly,
April

name: Serena kay
text: I found a place where I could get help for my autistic son that's transitioning into adulthood. It's nice to have a place we can call and talk to and get help with medications without coming across as different or weird.  They deal with these things on a daily basis and it feels good to be understood.

resp.text:
Hi, Serena Kay. Thank you for the five-star review. We appreciate you and your feedback.
Sincerely,
April

name: Shae McIntyre
text: First of all it took 3 months to get in to see a nurse practitioner to try to get different medication for my anxiety. Second, I finally get to my appointment and because I have shingles (which is a. Only contagious when the fluid in the blisters are touched but b. All of my stuff was covered and wrapped up) they said they would need to do a full decontamination sweep and I would have to get the clearance from my doctor before I can be seen  . So I spent an hour there waiting just to hear I'm the plague basically. I've never felt so offended. I already cant go to my own brothers wedding because of it but now this. I'm furious.

resp.text:
Shae, I am very sorry to hear we did not meet your expectations of care. Your feedback will help us improve our services. If you would like to provide us with additional information, you can speak to someone in our patient relations department by calling (833) 921-1810.
Kindly,
April

name: Juli Norman
text: Some of the most unkind judgmental unprofessional human beings I’ve ever met. Worst money I ever spent looking for help. Went here due to my doctor no longer being in practice and instead of getting back on my regular medications I Was accused of being under the influence by the NP I saw, being two days post op. She stated “you seem drowsy and irritable” I’m tired and in pain (since I was driving I couldn’t take my pain medication). The woman who took me back for my weight and BP answered her phone and began screaming at someone about what only I can assume was her boyfriend cheating on her. Not a single employee looked at me with a smile or made me feel welcome in the slightest. These woman look at you and judge you, they didn’t even talk to me before I felt like I wanted to run out of that building. I just wish I had read reviews before giving them my money.

resp.text:
Juli,  thanks for sharing your feedback. I am sorry your experience didn’t match your expectations. Your feedback will help us improve. Please feel free to reach out to our Patient Relations department (833) 921-1811 with any further comments, concerns, or suggestions you wish to share.
Kindly,
April

name: Ingrid Hartman
text: My family’s experience has always great!  The location is convenient, the medical staff thorough and the clinicians spend the time needed. Thank you!

resp.text: Hi, Ingrid! Thank you for the five-star review. It is our goal to deliver the utmost in care to our patients and their families so they can live their best lives.

name: Christa Bailey
text: People who come to BayView for help have issues. I was 2 minutes late and had to check in (wait for 6 minutes in line because a computer was down and I was standing there not knowing what to do and nobody would even look at me). I was told that I was 10 minutes late and my appointment is only 20 minutes long so I could reschedule or the doctor would work me in -of course I will have a no-show fee. I have never been here and not had to wait 15 minutes to see doc-I guess it’s a one way street.

name: Samantha Wade Caraway
text: DO NOT GO TO BAYVIEW! THESE PEOPLE DO NOT CARE ABOUT THEIR PATIENTS! They can not even file insurance correctly. If you don't agree with them, they will refuse to do ANYTHING for you. Their only option is to increase meds that do not work or put the patient in the hospital. If I could put ZERO stars, I would!

name: Richard Vin Zant
text: Yeah worst record keeping of any business I’ve been too.

resp.text:
Hi, Richard. I am sorry to hear we did not meet your expectations. Your feedback will help us improve our services. If you would like to provide any further information, please email us at info@altapointe.org
April

name: Davin Bostic
text: Chad Smith is very good. I highly recommend  his services.

name: Abigail Perez
text: Don’t waste your time. We waited 3 weeks for an appointment for my younger sister. Krissy Woods at the front desk was very unprofessional and straight up rude. Growing up with a single dad working 60-80 hour work week and a mom that isn’t present in our lives so they refused service to a 13 y/o because a parent was unable to come despite never telling me with the excuse “we assumed her mom would take her”. They obviously do not care for the well being of others and mental health doesn’t seem to be the #1 priority. The building is sad and the lobby was horrendous; it was not welcoming nor pleasant. Spent a total of 10 minutes in that place and will never ever step foot in it again. I understand HIPPA laws but the system is corrupt and this is why it’s hard for poor Americans to seek the help they need.

name: Amanda C.
text: My son has been going to this clinic for several years now. Everyone we have ever interacted with has been caring and kind and helpful; from the girls at the front desk to accounting to the RN and NP and the director of the clinic. I am so grateful to the folks at Mountain Lakes and extremely thankful to have this clinic in my community. I would recommend Mountain Lakes Guntersville to anyone in need of behavioral healthcare.

name: Vickie Thompson
text: I go here monthly they have a friendly staff. They do work with scheduling appointments 30 minutes apart for a separate family member on the same day.  They work closely with the school schedule to make it where they miss as little school as possible. The therapist are open to many very different situations and help with ways to achieve your goals.  Ways of managing stress. The nurse helps as close as possible to get medication good for the clients needs. I've been here 10 years and highly recommend this management center for many reasons.

name: hops
text: when i asked for more than once a month therapy they slapped me in the face with "we'll bump it up to twice a month"       lol

name: Constance Beasley
text: Waste of time trying to get income based services unless you're about to commit suicide that day or you've been in jail or had/have a drug problem. They made me feel stupid for even trying to get help with my diagnosed and untreated bipolar disorder. I left the office in tears.

name: Art Of Valor
text: Very helpful people!

name: Joseph Ruiz
text: Good service, but it is very hard to get a quick appointment.

name: Lizabeth Foster McClintock
text: Very helpful staff and amazing councillors

name: Alana Marisin
text: Dr Blanchard is an amazing counsellor, not just for me but my entire family. I recommend him any day. I’ve known Dr. Blanchard now for the past 10 years and he has made a tremendous counsellor, a great listener not just to me but for my entire family. He’s always available to listen especially when ur in need of his assistance. This is the best psychologist ever and I recommend him for the entire family. He’s very experienced in family dynamics even as an  international client, I applaud him for his availability to provide the therapy needed in my life.

name: Malcolm
text: Dr.Blanchard is an outstanding therapist! He cares deeply about his patients and their well being. I highly recommend him if you are looking for a professional, caring doctor!

name: Que
text: My experience with Dr. Blanchard has been outstanding. I'm so grateful that I've found him. He is professional, respectful, and non-judgmental, and most importantly he makes you feel like family. If you are looking for professional services, I highly recommend Dr. Blanchard, he is the best.

name: Rosalind Townsend
text: When all hope was gone.We met Dr. Blanchard. A Big glimmer of hope was restored. I highly recommend Dr. Danny for all of your counseling needs. He's very professional and proficient in all clientele matters. He actually cares about you as an individual. He also has a 97% successful rate in helping Veterans. uptain Disability Claims awarded.

name: Donna Gaines
text:
My experience with Dr. Danny Blanchard is outstanding. He has really helped and helping me tremendously. : A good doctor who works hard to serve humanity and handle with care his/her patient always deserve appreciation Sending you my heartfelt thankfulness for caring and comforting. Your presence holds a positive vibe that is more powerful than your prescribed medicines.

Thank you so much for doing a great job for me.You’ve always been successful to keep my spirits up and maintaining good health.

No matter the illness is, against a doctor like you, they get no chance. Thanks for being such a kind doctor and being patient all the time.

name: Blake Reynolds
text: Dr. Blanchard is a good counselor and a caring man. I highly recommend you consider his services.

name: Pamela Jenkins
text: Dr. Danny Blanchard is superb. He is able to relate to his clients in a very personable manner. Dr. Blanchard cares deeply for the well-being of his clients. His staff is always courteous and ready to be of assistance. The office is always impeccable. I would highly recommend Dr. Danny Blanchard to anyone in need of a therapist.

name: TheMoonfeather
text: he will work with you. he is very helpful. i would recommend him to anyone. he cares for his patients.

name: Shalanda White
text: Dr. Blanchard and staff are exceptional at making customers feel welcome and cared about no matter where they came from,. Race, religion, status in life or what they’ve done doesn’t hinder excellent service.  Dr. Blanchard accepts everyone for who they are but is just when acknowledging when you’re right and when you’re wrong. I love that! He is a loving but just psychologist.

name: Deandra Spears
text: I highly recommend Dr. Danny Blanchard. He's very compassionate with his clients and will go above and beyond to help those in need. I love walking into his office and being greeted with care, concern, and respect from both him and his staff!! If you're looking for someone to help with your overall mental health, I'd highly recommend that you make an appointment to see Dr. Danny Blanchard!!

name: Alexis Harris
text: Dr Blanchard is an excellent marriage and family counselor. He is well known and very professional.  I strongly recommend him if u are seeking professional services.

name: Stephen Washington
text: A outstanding Mental Health Professional..I highly recommend him...My entire family ; Wife, Children & grand Children only go to Dr. Blanchard for Counseling and Guidance..We highly recommend him...STEPHEN D. WASHINGTON

name: Kay Rogers
text: Dr. Blanchard's was the best decision that I made for my son who has a mental illness. We searched and visited many professionals throughout Alabama and Georgia and Dr. Blanchard was the one who was able to understand my sons condition, relate to him, and educate me on his condition while providing us with tools to use at home. Dr. Blanchard is an excellent mental health professional.

name: ll72hima
text:
Dr. Blanchard is very understanding and efficient when comes to patient care.
I highly recommended Professional Facility.

name: dana douglas
text: My experience with Dr. Blanchard was a 5 star he is a man of his word I appreciate his hard work and patience. I strongly recommend him !!! 🙌🏾

name: Chammy Deesnit
text: Dr. Blanchard is an impressive person. He is very professional. He helped me to imrpove my mental situation. I highly recommend him.

name: Tyhara Rain
text: Very professional, and well respected. Very dedicated to his practice and wellness of community. Goes above and beyond for patients and is accommodating to their needs.

name: Gwendolyn Ragland
text: I have known Dr. Blanchard for over twenty years and he has made a tremendous positive influence on my life and members of my family.  He is professional, knowledgeable and compassionate and really goes the extra mile for his patients.

name: Peachees Eason
text: Nice to talk to but when things are promised to be done they are never done on time or in a timely matter. Each time I needed paperwork submitted or prescription refill it was a hassle. Every single time I have had to drive from Bailey Cove to Sparkman anywhere 3-4 times in one day to get paperwork or refills. I try to support my black community but when it comes to doing things they are never done.

name: JESSICA ALEXANDER
text: Absolutely satisfied with Dr. Blanchard’s services.  I could not ask for a more professional caring experience.

name: Brittany S
text: I highly recommend Dr. Blanchard. He has away of building self esteem. Stop by and make an appointment.

name: Mr Information
text: The minute I walked in I knew it was trouble. His staff is poor, he never shows up for meetings he promises,and I even heard him lie to another client. The reason I know is because he promised me he would be there at the time he told that client he lied to. I sat outside his locked office  for a hour and he never showed up but told that person over the phone he was there at the times I was. Avoid this guy. If you want real help find someone else.

name: Kyla Meed
text: Dr. Blanchard is a great marriage and family counselor. He has a very nice and reliable staff.

name: Yvonne Hamilton
text: I highly recommend him. He is very passionate about his work . He staff is very helpful in helping you . He good beyond his duty to help you.

name: Timothy Byrd, Sr.
text:
Dr. Danny Blanchard is a wonderful counselor. I have known Danny for more than 40 years; I was a freshman in college and Danny was one of the student organizations officers at that time. Danny showed great leader ship even as a student .   Dr Blandchard inspired me to run for office as a student leader at that university. Danny shows great compassion and allows the client to speak and express themselves.

Dr Blandchard has a special knack for allowing the client to relax and give total surrender to his way of asking questions and getting to the bottom of the real issues and then develop a plan to resolve these issues one at a time in such a way that the client does not feel intimidated. The sta dr Blandchard has a special knack for allowing the client to relax and give total surrender to his way of asking questions getting to the bottom of the real issues and then develop a plan to resolve these issues one at a time in such a way that the client does not feel intimidated. The staff at Dr Blandchard’s office is very professional and they always keep matters cup for dinner soo The staff at Dr Blandchard office is very professional and they always keep matters  confidential. Dr Blandchard knows exactly when to bring in other members of the family to resolve family issues and matters. He never rushes a client for a speedy answer that is to say before all the issues I brought forth. Dr Blandchard has a multitude of contacts and ways of helping clients mentally physically and financially. Sometimes clients don’t have the money to pay but Danny will help them anyway. I have total confidence in Dr Blandchard in everything that he does, he is a very strong  Community leader. Dr Blandchard never makes you feel small or unimportant or that your issues are trivial. He makes you feel as though you are closer than A family member.  Recommend Dr. Danny Blanchard as one of the best in his field and would recommend him to anyone who needs help. He’s a Christian man and a God-fearing man.

name: hur hur
text: Outstanding job! Dr. Blanchard cares for people and I highly recommend him!

name: Shantell Pendleton
text: Appreciate the great work Dr. Blanchard has done for us.

name: sharene Martin
text: I Highly recommend Dr. Blanchard. Very  professional.

name: ravine bullock
text: Dr Blanchard has helped me through my most toughest times in my life thus far . When I felt like giving up his counseling services gave me hope . I recommend him to anyone who is in doubt .

name: Catina Douglas
text: Careing understanding  patient  and professional

name: Ralisa Jones
text: Dr. Blanchard was there for me and my family when we really needed him the most!

name: Dirty Shawn
text: Dr. Danny Blanchard is the best at what he does

name: Maranda&Paul Godwin
text: I'm looking for a program for my brother an I seen the question on Mr.Larsons page. You helped someone you will be blessed for that. What they do with it is on them. I have heard of this place tho so I'm sure its legit!!!

name: Larson Hicks
text: Is this for real? I gave the dude outside of the dollar store some money, but not sure if it’s legit?

name: TOM JUNGKIND
text: After 4 sessions with my 14yr old daughter, I requested a phone call to discuss her progress. I was essentially told that I wasn't privileged to any info without my 14yr [ minor] old's "permission". Had this therapist, and that's the limit of her  professional credentials, been more willing to discuss my minor daughters treatment, we might not be looking elsewhere for help!

resp.text: Thank you for letting us know about your experience and we are very sorry to hear you were not satisfied with our services.  IHS is committed to following all federal and state laws/regulations.  In the state of Alabama, a fourteen-year-old is given the right to consent to treatment which means it is up to them on what information is disclosed.  While this may seem unfair and may not make sense, we are obligated to follow all federal and state regulations.

name: Sean Bailey
text: Kayla is awesome! She has helped me navigate some really challenging times, and I am so grateful.

name: Hillary w
text: Michelle has been a godsend. I don't know that we would have made it without her. She is open to working with unusual problems and is very knowledgeable about the lgbtq population. The techniques I learned were very helpful and she had been great at helping us keep on the right path.

name: Jennifer Veitch
text: I have worked with and known Michelle Knight for over a decade. She truly cares for others and the community. Her genuine helping spirit makes it easy to talk to her. She empowers others, is knowledgeable about different theories/approaches to helping, communicates well, and listens effectively! I highly recommend Integrated Health Services!

name: Winnie Luna
text: Their response to my last review (from Lola) was that they would make exceptions due to illness.... We were Ill and getting tested for COVID. They still not have made this right. I had to make another review because I could not respond to their response. Just know if you are sick during a pandemic, they will still steal your money.

name: Alexandra Traviss
text: Michelle deeply cares about her clients, has tremendous empathy, and is a truly professional counselor.

name: Abbey Mitchell
text: Michelle is very professional and seems to really care about her work and her clients!

name: L K
text:
She values money over her client’s wellbeing. I missed one appointment for extenuating circumstances, and my credit card was charged $140. I very nicely asked for one grace period, and I was vulnerable to her about my situation. She said I could do a payment plan, and I agreed. I also emailed her though that I would prefer to find another therapist that cares more about their patient’s wellbeing over money considering there is a global pandemic, and everyone is struggling. Since then, she has not responded to my emails in order to help get the charge off my credit card for the payment plan.

Part of working with people who are working on themselves should be showing grace in times of need.

resp.text: Integrative Health Services, LLC requires every client to sign an agreement stating they understand they will be charged for a no show or a later cancellation. We allow up to a twenty four hour notice for cancellations. Our policy also notes exceptions for medical issues such as being sick where we excuse a no show or late cancel but the client must meet the requirements for this as outlined in the policy. We want every client to be happy with our services and we give everyone the opportunity to decline working with us if they disagree with our no show late cancellation policy.

name: B K
text: I love everything! The counselors are wonderful, front desk and everyone in between are incredibly kind and you can tell they really care. I feel very comfortable and actually look forward to my visits here.

name: Tommy Reynolds
text:
The counselors provide a caring, supportive atmosphere where folk can be safe, and heard.  Healing can take place here.

The office is on the second floor.  Not sure if there is an elevator there.  Call ahead and they can accommodate with one first-floor room.

name: Timothy Townsend
text: Would be a five star review, but you have to climb a mountain to get into the office.

name: Tom S
text: They genuinely care. You're not just a paycheck
